column5: It is a NICE bass!
Yes it's a dandy!  Also someone exercising their rights to "OUR" 2nd Amendment
Nice bass..... side arm is AOK with me too..... but he should really pull his fly up.....  Burt
He's just making sure people respect his fishing spot! What's the issue...
Never know when the government is going to take over!  Gotta be prepared!
you can never be too cautious, zombies and sasquatches love fresh fish

you can never be too cautious, zombies and sasquatches love fresh fish  Rednecks do too. I was fishing in Pennsylvania a few years back and watched from the opposite side of the stream as 3 really rough looking camo clad hillbillies sneaked up behind my buddy and grabbed a trout lying on a snowbank 10' behind him. He had no clue.  One of the funnier things I've seen while fishing.
If I thought I needed a gun to keep me safe while fishing, I'd give up fishing.
HH
If I thought I needed a gun to keep me safe while fishing, I'd give up fishing.   Never fished oshawa creek Eh.
Never fished oshawa creek Eh.  Bring some vodka and a few white buckets, you'll be everyones best friend.
American fisherman?? well if that't the case it's not a bass---it's a hawgg!
Real rednecks don't carry Glocks
I SAID PASS ME THE WORMS NOW!!!!!!!!!!!
Well he has to be packin just in case that bass gets out of hand!!!  God bless America and Smith and Wesson!!!
Some one has to keep them launching ramp crowds under control? Maybe there are gators in the water? LOL
Go Ahead Cormorant....Make my Day

Some areas we fish in a side arm is needed, as a kid we always had one in the boat for gators and snakes in the trees. You are running the boat thru canals that are sometimes 8 ft across with a complete canape of trees over your head in Louisiana. A nice tasty gator presents itself and you had gator and fish to fry up.   Art
............ Well bass, do ya feel lucky?.................
Falcon Lake, in Texas, is on the Rio Grand.  There has been trouble with the Mexican drug cartels. Read about robberies and piracy here... http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Piracy_on_Falcon_Lake

No pirates here, all we have to deal with on the Ottawa river is Quebec wardens. You have to provide proof you are using Quebec minnows if you are fishing on their side of the river. Palez-vous francias? Mosieur Varion!
he's a game warden undercover
Thats awesome! Wish I could carry when I go fishing
